text: Inverness TMD is a railway traction maintenance depot situated in Inverness, Scotland. The depot, visible from Inverness station, is operated by Abellio ScotRail. The current depot code is IS, previously the shed code was 60A. 37025, owned by the Scottish Railway Preservation Society is named 'Inverness TMD'. ==Allocation== *Class 08 X 2 *Class 158, 158701 to 158725 *Independent Drift Snowploughs, ADB 965234 and ADB 965243 ==References== Rail Atlas Great Britain & Ireland, S.K. Baker Category:Transport in Highland (council area) Category:Inverness Category:Rail transport in Scotland Category:Railway depots in Scotland
title: Inverness TMD
